Question
========

Of 53 hospitalized patients, the length of their hospitalization was determined. This was found to be an average of 6.3 days with a standard deviation of 6.9 days. The distribution of the variable "hospitalization" is:

Answerlist
----------

* Symmetrical
* Left-skewed
* Right-skewed
* None of the above

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Symmetrical: Incorrect
* Left-skewed: Incorrect
* Right-skewed: Correct
* None of the above: Incorrect
